news_header: A gang leader was shot dead in a courthouse in Sri Lanka by a disguised gunman.
news_original_title: Man disguised as lawyer kills gang leader in court
news_text: Sanjeewa Kumara Samararathne, a notorious gang leader in Sri Lanka, was shot dead in a courthouse by a gunman disguised as a lawyer. The shooting occurred while he was being escorted to court to face multiple murder charges. The gunman, who used a revolver smuggled in a hollowed-out book by a female accomplice, managed to escape but was later captured. Authorities are investigating the incident and have arrested a policeman and a van driver suspected of aiding the suspects. The government is reviewing courthouse security measures and has promised to take gang violence seriously, as recent shootings have raised concerns about safety.
